metadata.Description: The framework and processes for decision-making, policy development, and regulation in the energy sector to ensure sustainable and equitable energy access.

energy governance.Description: Energy governance implements Energy Efficiency Policy to promote energy-saving practices and policies.
Energy governance funds Renewable Energy Projects to support the transition to clean and sustainable energy sources.
Energy governance focuses on improving energy access for all communities, especially in remote and underserved areas.
Energy governance operates within the framework of the National Energy Policy to ensure coordinated and effective energy management.
Energy governance partners with the Private Sector to leverage their expertise and resources in advancing sustainable energy initiatives.
Energy governance contributes to climate change mitigation efforts by promoting the use of renewable energy and reducing greenhouse gas emissions.
Energy governance monitors energy consumption patterns to identify areas for improvement and optimize energy efficiency.
Energy governance targets the reduction of energy poverty by implementing policies and programs to ensure affordable and reliable energy access for all.
Energy governance addresses energy security concerns by diversifying energy sources and promoting resilience in the energy sector.
